column3: Hopefully I did it right this time. Thanks to @michaelfolkson for the guidance!

You on IRC or is there some way to chat to help you with Git off of this PR? You opened the PR from master branch again and you will also need to [squash commits](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits).
Ah, my bad. I have Discord, Telegram, Wickr, or email.
Can you send me an email michaelfolkson at gmail dot com? And close this PR. Thanks
